isis.stitle: TSI 05-04-03 - Converting 4000 4 X 2 HPV Models with Hydraulic ABS Brakes to 4 X 4 Configuration may Increase Stopping Distance and is Not Approved by International Truck and Engine Corporation and Meritor Wabco

subjectgroup.subject: Converting 4000 4 X 2 HPV Models with Hydraulic ABS Brakes to 4 X 4 Configuration may Increase Stopping Distance and is Not Approved by International Truck and Engine Corporation and Meritor Wabco

geninfo.para: A 4000 HPV model originally manufactured as a 4 X 2 configuration with Meritor Wabco hydraulic ABS brakes must not be converted to 4 X 4 configuration.

In the event this warning is ignored the stopping distance may increase. The company providing the 4 X 4 conversion assumes the liability and responsibility of certifying the converted vehicle meets all safety regulations .

Refer to the pdf for this TSI for the letter that was sent to International Truck and Engine Corporation by Meritor Wabco concerning the conversion of International 4000 4 X 2 HPV models to 4 X 4 configuration.
